original: The Biostasis program, initiated by the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) on March 1, 2018, is directed by Dr. Tristan McClure-Begley. The primary objective of this program is to explore innovative methods for extending the critical "golden hour" for patients who have experienced traumatic injuries. This is achieved by slowing down cellular processes in the human body, thereby providing additional time for medical interv
